data.message: It seems no man is monogamistic for a true woman on some love shit who would do the splits on your dick and pump until she shakes and quakes then sucks you off just in case you didn't get enough comes back the next day ready to play parade on your dick again cuz its so good I know it there's no phibbing or storytellin when it's real and good you come back for more and you don't deserve no whore that's a bore and complains about chores and just wants the glory and the next man to cheat on you with not even knowing the true man she's about to miss but she'll surely diss if you dump her unmonogamistic ass like a bad bag of trash with a salty ass and no cash cuz she's too lazy to get her own always wanna be a whore and moan never finding a real piece of gold like you I can't believe it I'd treasure you I already do I'd show you all the things we can do and make sure your always got a smile and one coming cuz to me there is no shortcomings when it comes to a man like you you should be valued and showed how things are really true and no one should hurt you but I know too too many ppl do and it's  sad but true and 223 to many men out there for me 1684 hit me up if your interested in more I've known you from the start from paper and lines and you've always been super fine wish I coulda made you mine back then but this bull shit age shit lies are sick and I never got to pick who I wanted and that sucks but now I got a lil rust so maybe we could try to come together I wanna make your life seem lighter than a feather and by the way it's Alicia and I hate cold weather hope you feel better and I love you forever  don't be scared to use my number xoxoxoxo that new CD bout to be something clever you earned your title rap god and that's forever 😘
